text: The 1946 Hardin–Simmons Cowboys football team represented the Hardin–Simmons University in the Border Conference during the 1946 college football season.https://www.sports-reference.com/cfb/schools/hardin-simmons/1946.html == Schedule == ==References== Hardin-Simmons Category:Hardin–Simmons Cowboys football seasons Category:Border Conference football champion seasons Hardin- Simmons Cowboys football
